plot: The Pearsons gather around Rebecca's bedside.

Kevin and Randall call in the rest of the family to the house as it looks like Rebecca will not have much longer. As the rest of the family convenes at the house, including some no longer officially part of the family, Rebecca goes through her own journey, one long promised to her by her father. As she waits for someone, she is taken on that journey by a guide, she reconnecting with people she hasn't seen in a while, and in the process learns of the reasons behind some life altering events.—Huggo

As the time is closing in for Rebecca, the whole family is coming all together for when the time comes. They do their best to be there for Rebecca for one final time. In her mind, Rebecca takes a trip throughout what her life has been like and everything that she has been through.—RECB3
